mapper.insert: insert into file(uuid, save_dir, file_name, file_isok, file_type, file_size, notice_num) values(#{uuid}, #{saveDir}, #{fileName}, #{fileIsok}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{noticeNum})
mapper.select: select * from file where notice_num = #{noticeNum} and file_isok='Y' order by file_reg_at asc
mapper.update: update file set file_isok='N' where uuid=#{uuid}
